data.title: Dean's Office
data.text:
Operations

Evelyn Alroy, Administrative Resources Coordinator

Arts and Letters, Room 600

619-594-3142

[email protected]

Areas of Responsibilities: Operating Fund Allocations and Budget Transfers, Human Resources Recruitment Process for Staff, Procurement Credit Card Administration, Oracle Financials Training and Support, Federal Work-Study Division Coordinator, Faculty/Department Office Space, T2 and Travel Coordination, IRA Funds, Cost Center Manager for Equipment Inventory

Bart Chafe, Assistant to the Dean

Arts and Letters, Room 600

619-594-5456

[email protected]

Areas of Responsibilities: Council of Chairs and Directors (planning and minutes), Dean's Calendar, Finch conference room reservations (AL-660), Faculty Foundation Accounting and Administration, University Grant Program, Critical Thinking Grant, and Microgrants, Faculty Recruitment, CAL Committee Coordinator, Sabbatical and Difference in Pay Leave Process, CAL Election Coordinator, Assist Director of Development

Monica Cortez, Administrative Support Assistant

Arts and Letters, Room 600

619-594-4756

[email protected]

Areas of Responsibilities: Administrative support for CAL interdisciplinary programs, Backup to our front desk operations

Susanna Di Norcia-Bassi, Instructional Resources and ATF Coordinator

Arts and Letters, Room 600

619-594-3724

[email protected]

Areas of Responsibilities: Instructional Budgets, Dept. Budget Planning Documents, Faculty Appointments, Chair's Renewal, Instructional Student Assistant Funds, Visas (J-1 for Visiting Faculty), Web Portal requests

Kiana Kikuchi, Administrative Support Coordinator

Arts and Letters, Room 600

619-594-2974

[email protected]

Areas of Responsibilities: Conference room reservations (AL Bldg. only), Online purchase requisitions and iPCC/iCTC purchases, Travel forms for Dean's Office staff, Contracts and billing for CAL's Social Science Research Lab, Student Employment Authorization forms, Facilities/TNS work orders, Paycheck distribution, CAL Faculty Rosters, Dean's Office parking passes and mail, Technology Acquisition Review Process (TARP)
